data.title: Back to School Information, 2024-25
data.meta_description: This page contains important all-school and divisional information that families should use to prepare for the 2024-25 School Year.
data.text:

Click here for the Plaid Peddler website and online ordering

Summer Hours: June 3rd - July 19th: Mon -Fri, 9:00 am - 1:00 pm (1:00 - 4:00 pm by appointment)

Closed: June 17th - 21st

Regular Hours Resume on July 17th: Mon - Fri, 8:00 am - 4:00 pm

Mark your calendars for the HPA Uniform Resale on August 12th from 8:00 am - 2:30 pm and August 13th from 8:00 am - 2:30 pm under the Smith Shirley Campus Center.
